name: rheinfaktor
description:
rheinfaktor - Agency for Communication GmbH is an owner-managed agency with core competencies in strategic consulting and communication design, including the priorities advertising, PR and digital communications. 
For over 10 years we have implemented our comprehensive, brand-oriented understanding of communication successfully for large and medium-sized companies such as Akzo Nobel, Essilor, ADAC, Sony, Barbican, Sandvik Coromant, and msg systems.
